name.en: Research Method (I) -- Statistics in Education and Psychology
name.ch: 研究法(一)--教育與心理統計學

department.ch: 學習與教學研究所碩士班

goal.en: "The main purpose of this course is to construct the basic ability of the quantitative research for the graduate students, and to help students to actually execute quantitative research. Course topics include the basic concepts of descriptive statistics and inferential statistics, including probability distributions, confidence interval, and hypothesis testing. Additionally, the subjects also include advanced statistical concepts, including analysis of variance, multiple regression analysis, and category data analysis. The way of this course includes narration and operation in order to build students‘ abilities in statistical theory and practice."
goal.ch: 本課程主要目的在奠定碩士班同學在量化研究的基礎，並能實際解決量化方面的研究問題。課程主題包括描述統計及推論統計的基本概念，包含機率分佈、區間估計及假設檢定。同時，主題也包含進階的統計概念，包含變異數分析、類別資料分析。課程進行包含講述及軟體實作，以期奠定學生在統計學理論及實務的能力。

content.en:
Introduction
Frequency distribution, measure of central tendency and variation
Operating：Describe statistics
Normal distribution and Z distribution
Sampling distribution & Confidence interval
Hypothesis testing
The difference between two means
Operating：Confidence interval and Hypothesis testing
One-way ANOVA
Two-way ANOVA and the interaction effects
Repeat measure &Operating：ANOVA
Covariance, correlation, and regression analysis
Multiple regression analysis
Operating：Correlation and regression analysis
Categorical data analysis
Nonparametric statistics
Operating：Categorical data analysis
Final assignment submit
content.ch:
心理與教育統計學基本介紹
次數分配、集中量數及分散量數
實作：描述統計
常態分配與連續機率分配
抽樣分配與區間估計
假設檢定
兩平均數差異檢定
停課一日
實作：兩平均數差異
單因子變異數分析與事後比較
雙因子變異數分析與交互作用
變異數分析組內效果
實作：變異數分析
相關分析、迴歸分析
多元迴歸分析
實作：相關與迴歸分析
類別資料分析
實作：類別資料分析、期末作業發放
期末作業繳交

textbook.en: Navarro, D.J., Foxcroft, D.R., & Faulkenberry, T.J. (2019). Learning Statistics with JASP: A Tutorial for Psychology Students and Other Beginners."
textbook.ch: Navarro, D.J., Foxcroft, D.R., & Faulkenberry, T.J. (2019). Learning Statistics with JASP: A Tutorial for Psychology Students and Other Beginners. 王文中、錢才瑋 (2012)。統計學與Excel資料分析之實習應用(第六版)。台北：博碩。"

grading.ch: 1). 課堂參與 20% 2). 平時作業 50% 3). 期末考試 30%

domain.en: 學習與評量 、 研究法
domain.ch: 學習與評量 、 研究法

實作/實驗 ， 出席/課堂表現
